{"code":1,"isDone":false,"toInsertArticleList":[{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 06:30:28","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 06:30:28","title":"DIY Wood Peg Rail Organizer","link":"http://www.iheartorganizing.com/2019/11/diy-wood-peg-rail-organizer.html","description":"The rail of hooks that we recently added to our laundry room was one of our easiest DIYs yet. And at the same time, it is one of my most favorite! I absolutely love how charming it is and I sort of want to make a few more varieties for our bathrooms and garage.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9kAIteQKXX4/XccHOT45lJI/AAAAAAABPVc/VaDilts41wUIaRdId3-rO95f2iY4DhLpgCNcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_DIY_Peg_Rail_Organizer_Wood_Project_Header2.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img alt=\"IHeart Organizing DIY Wood Peg Rail Organizer\" border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9kAIteQKXX4/XccHOT45lJI/AAAAAAABPVc/VaDilts41wUIaRdId3-rO95f2iY4DhLpgCNcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_DIY_Peg_Rail_Organizer_Wood_Project_Header2.png\" title=\"IHeart Organizing DIY Wood Peg Rail Organizer\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />These wooden peg rails are popping up all over in stores at a variety of prices. Some less expensive than others, but none as inexpensive as the one we were able to make ourselves. Plus, isn't it always the greatest when you can customize it to fit your space in size and color? Yes and yes.\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<a name=\"more\"></a>\n<br />\n<br />To get started, I ran to Home Depot to pick up a \n<a href=\"http://bit.ly/34HRA6f\" target=\"_blank\">1\" x 2\" oak wood board</a>, which I purchased by the linear foot (2 feet @ $0.81/foot). I also found \n<a href=\"http://bit.ly/2X10UPL\" target=\"_blank\">an oak dowel</a> to coordinate, and decided to go with the 3/4\" diameter. The best part about this project is that you can determine the length and number of pegs that you would like select your sizes accordingly.\n<br />\n<br />The only tools that we used to assemble the rail of pegs is \n<a href=\"http://bit.ly/2NUpHAZ\" target=\"_blank\">our miter saw</a> (you could also use \n<a href=\"http://bit.ly/2Q2pKxu\" target=\"_blank\">a simple miter box</a>), and \n<a href=\"http://bit.ly/2Q39XOI\" target=\"_blank\">our drill</a> with \n<a href=\"http://bit.ly/34RdO5X\" target=\"_blank\">a 3/4\" spade bit</a>&nbsp;and \n<a href=\"http://bit.ly/36OzKAs\" target=\"_blank\">a bottle of wood glue</a>.\n<br />\n<br />Step one is to measure the desired length and cut the 1\" x 2\" board to size. I only had a small spot to fill and planned to use the rail to hold hand towels and small cleaning supplies, so I decided on 16\" in length.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dPIlO3fYxuc/XccHLHql1yI/AAAAAAABPV8/XxumYu_3acobamrKMLvFletin7DGpJqLgCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_DIY_Peg_Rail_Organizer_Wood_Project_2.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img alt=\"IHeart Organizing DIY Wood Peg Rail Organizer\" border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"733\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dPIlO3fYxuc/XccHLHql1yI/AAAAAAABPV8/XxumYu_3acobamrKMLvFletin7DGpJqLgCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_DIY_Peg_Rail_Organizer_Wood_Project_2.png\" title=\"IHeart Organizing DIY Wood Peg Rail Organizer\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />I then decided that I wanted the rail to have a total of four peg hooks, so we cut a portion of the dowel into four, two-inch pieces.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MhXpUR8sB7w/XccHLKO9YwI/AAAAAAABPV4/qB64bOcY8Do72O_0D2St0v1DjKsiXOSuACEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_DIY_Peg_Rail_Organizer_Wood_Project_3.png\" imageanchor=\"1\"><img alt=\"IHeart Organizing DIY Wood Peg Rail Organizer\" border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"733\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MhXpUR8sB7w/XccHLKO9YwI/AAAAAAABPV4/qB64bOcY8Do72O_0D2St0v1DjKsiXOSuACEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_DIY_Peg_Rail_Organizer_Wood_Project_3.png\" title=\"IHeart Organizing DIY Wood Peg Rail Organizer\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />To inset the pegs we used the 3/4\" spade bit and our drill.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5DV9_36OBwI/XccHM69GFzI/AAAAAAABPV8/gv4C7FxNdSU3Pi3bcyUzSZW5pKcQhND9gCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_DIY_Peg_Rail_Organizer_Wood_Project_6.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img alt=\"IHeart Organizing DIY Wood Peg Rail Organizer\" border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"733\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5DV9_36OBwI/XccHM69GFzI/AAAAAAABPV8/gv4C7FxNdSU3Pi3bcyUzSZW5pKcQhND9gCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_DIY_Peg_Rail_Organizer_Wood_Project_6.png\" title=\"IHeart Organizing DIY Wood Peg Rail Organizer\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />To determine the spacing on the rail, I decided on how much space I wanted on each end and marked accordingly. Then, I measured the distance between the two endpoints and divided by three to be sure the spacing was balanced. I also wanted the pegs completely center on the rail.\n<br />\n<br />The final step in assembling was to use wood glue and insert the pegs.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-u9mx_Ux5GXE/XccHNJYi2kI/AAAAAAABPV8/oV6dIEt2fWssNWgTUgaqa62CL8EyJz1SQCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_DIY_Peg_Rail_Organizer_Wood_Project_7.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img alt=\"IHeart Organizing DIY Wood Peg Rail Organizer\" border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"733\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-u9mx_Ux5GXE/XccHNJYi2kI/AAAAAAABPV8/oV6dIEt2fWssNWgTUgaqa62CL8EyJz1SQCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_DIY_Peg_Rail_Organizer_Wood_Project_7.png\" title=\"IHeart Organizing DIY Wood Peg Rail Organizer\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />\n<i><b>Quick Tip:</b> Pay attention to the wood grain on the end of the peg during this process. I didn't and later noticed that the grain on each peg was going in a slightly different direction. I will call it charming character, but if those things bother you, this is the time to take notice.</i>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PvtNnv8-z8o/XccHNBz8kqI/AAAAAAABPWA/OjZsVnEmu-sU6AQ-3wILpHnxOGgZc85JQCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_DIY_Peg_Rail_Organizer_Wood_Project_8.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img alt=\"IHeart Organizing DIY Wood Peg Rail Organizer\" border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"450\" data-original-width=\"600\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PvtNnv8-z8o/XccHNBz8kqI/AAAAAAABPWA/OjZsVnEmu-sU6AQ-3wILpHnxOGgZc85JQCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_DIY_Peg_Rail_Organizer_Wood_Project_8.png\" title=\"IHeart Organizing DIY Wood Peg Rail Organizer\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />You could add weight to the top of the pegs while the glue sets and dries, but we didn't and just let everything cure overnight. The pegs are extremely secure and feel fairly strong for holding anything from cleaning tools to towels to wet clothing or a jacket.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fC-1bI1HlhM/XccHOZgnB9I/AAAAAAABPWA/lwKJ528GuNcMEksDlVrSDGfMe_-JQdSJQCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Laundry_Room_Wallpaper_Update_2.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img alt=\"IHeart Organizing DIY Wood Peg Rail Organizer\" border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fC-1bI1HlhM/XccHOZgnB9I/AAAAAAABPWA/lwKJ528GuNcMEksDlVrSDGfMe_-JQdSJQCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Laundry_Room_Wallpaper_Update_2.png\" title=\"IHeart Organizing DIY Wood Peg Rail Organizer\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />To install the rail of hooks I used two large picture hanging Command Strips that hold up to 16 pounds of weight (which is plenty for how we are using the organizer). You could also drill through the rail and affix it to the wall with screws.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3aAQXkU9EpY/XccHPZK-iJI/AAAAAAABPWE/Nc2C0SWmDcA35pe84Tat4dt0T0hRiFlWQCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Laundry_Room_Wallpaper_Update_4.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img alt=\"IHeart Organizing DIY Wood Peg Rail Organizer\" border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3aAQXkU9EpY/XccHPZK-iJI/AAAAAAABPWE/Nc2C0SWmDcA35pe84Tat4dt0T0hRiFlWQCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Laundry_Room_Wallpaper_Update_4.png\" title=\"IHeart Organizing DIY Wood Peg Rail Organizer\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />Prior to installing I also quickly stained the rail in a natural finish to match the other wood tones throughout the room. It could also be painted or waxed, whatever you wish!\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zxc_h1j4n2g/XccHOlHSkmI/AAAAAAABPWM/Di5-rXWdY-8A2oGWOCdjGII6Avd9TqNewCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Laundry_Room_Wallpaper_Update_26.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img alt=\"IHeart Organizing DIY Wood Peg Rail Organizer\" border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zxc_h1j4n2g/XccHOlHSkmI/AAAAAAABPWM/Di5-rXWdY-8A2oGWOCdjGII6Avd9TqNewCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Laundry_Room_Wallpaper_Update_26.png\" title=\"IHeart Organizing DIY Wood Peg Rail Organizer\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />This was definitely the easiest DIY in the space, and maybe even the most darling. \n<a href=\"http://www.iheartorganizing.com/2019/09/our-laundry-room-today.html\" target=\"_blank\">You can find a tour of our entire laundry room here, along with sources</a>.\n<br />\n<br />I still owe you the DIY cabinet door tutorial which I am putting together soon. You can also catch up on all of the other laundry room DIY's below:\n<br />\n<br />\n<a href=\"http://www.iheartorganizing.com/2014/02/built-in-laundry-sortingfolding-station.html\" target=\"_blank\">DIY Wall Storage</a>\n<br />\n<a href=\"http://www.iheartorganizing.com/2016/05/laundry-room-update-built-in-wshiplap.html\" target=\"_blank\">DIY Shiplap and Sorting Baskets</a>\n<br />\n<a href=\"http://www.iheartorganizing.com/2016/10/laundry-room-update-lowering-hookups.html\" target=\"_blank\">Lowering the Laundry Hookups and Installing the Folding Counter</a>\n<br />\n<a href=\"http://www.iheartorganizing.com/2016/10/laundry-room-update-installing-drop-in.html\" target=\"_blank\">Installing a Drop-in Sink</a>\n<br />\n<a href=\"http://www.iheartorganizing.com/2016/11/laundry-room-update-toetally-fantastic.html\" target=\"_blank\">DIY Decorative Sink Toe-Kick</a>\n<br />\n<a href=\"http://www.iheartorganizing.com/2016/11/laundry-room-update-diy-floating-wood.html\" target=\"_blank\">DIY Floating Wood Shelf</a>\n<br />\n<a href=\"http://www.iheartorganizing.com/2017/03/tile-backsplash-installation-tips-tricks.html\" target=\"_blank\">Tile Backsplash Installation</a>\n<br />\n<a href=\"http://www.iheartorganizing.com/2017/01/organizing-under-laundry-room-sink-diy.html\" target=\"_blank\">Organizing Under the Laundry Room Sink</a>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ju4fhtpke1w/XccUweXQlTI/AAAAAAABPWU/W26b2OzniN8YJLvaRVS9n7n-hceLHgjjACNcBGAsYHQ/s1600/Post_Sources.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"59\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ju4fhtpke1w/XccUweXQlTI/AAAAAAABPWU/W26b2OzniN8YJLvaRVS9n7n-hceLHgjjACNcBGAsYHQ/s1600/Post_Sources.png\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />\n<center>\n <div class=\"shopthepost-widget\" data-widget-id=\"3792568\">\n  <script type=\"text/javascript\">!function(w,i,d,g,e,t){if (!d.getElementById(i)) {element = d.createElement(t);element.id = i;element.src = 'https://widgets.rewardstyle.com' + e;d.body.appendChild(element);} if (typeof w[g] === 'object') { if (d.readyState === 'complete') { w[g].init(); +0000","feedId":5474,"bgimg":"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9kAIteQKXX4/XccHOT45lJI/AAAAAAABPVc/VaDilts41wUIaRdId3-rO95f2iY4DhLpgCNcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_DIY_Peg_Rail_Organizer_Wood_Project_Header2.png","linkMd5":"586cd94306bb2cfbaa2930dc0b860e1e","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn66@2020_4/2020/08/24/22-30-29-052_df7ec130d7421c0f.webp","destWidth":550,"destHeight":825,"sourceBytes":574737,"destBytes":36458,"author":"IHeart Organizing","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9kAIteQKXX4/XccHOT45lJI/AAAAAAABPVc/VaDilts41wUIaRdId3-rO95f2iY4DhLpgCNcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_DIY_Peg_Rail_Organizer_Wood_Project_Header2.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn66@2020_4/2020/08/24/22-30-29-052_df7ec130d7421c0f.webp","https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dPIlO3fYxuc/XccHLHql1yI/AAAAAAABPV8/XxumYu_3acobamrKMLvFletin7DGpJqLgCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_DIY_Peg_Rail_Organizer_Wood_Project_2.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn21@2020_6/2020/08/24/22-30-53-051_40dc8e95eee0f668.webp","https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MhXpUR8sB7w/XccHLKO9YwI/AAAAAAABPV4/qB64bOcY8Do72O_0D2St0v1DjKsiXOSuACEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_DIY_Peg_Rail_Organizer_Wood_Project_3.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn69@2020_6/2020/08/24/22-30-42-389_57705ce6d3f9dd84.webp","https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5DV9_36OBwI/XccHM69GFzI/AAAAAAABPV8/gv4C7FxNdSU3Pi3bcyUzSZW5pKcQhND9gCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_DIY_Peg_Rail_Organizer_Wood_Project_6.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn50@2020_5/2020/08/24/22-30-49-547_ed26ea9a911adbe5.webp","https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-u9mx_Ux5GXE/XccHNJYi2kI/AAAAAAABPV8/oV6dIEt2fWssNWgTUgaqa62CL8EyJz1SQCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_DIY_Peg_Rail_Organizer_Wood_Project_7.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn98@2020_5/2020/08/24/22-30-43-586_7d19d42ada0be59d.webp","https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PvtNnv8-z8o/XccHNBz8kqI/AAAAAAABPWA/OjZsVnEmu-sU6AQ-3wILpHnxOGgZc85JQCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_DIY_Peg_Rail_Organizer_Wood_Project_8.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn65@2020_3/2020/08/24/22-30-32-587_140f902cbf21def1.webp","https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fC-1bI1HlhM/XccHOZgnB9I/AAAAAAABPWA/lwKJ528GuNcMEksDlVrSDGfMe_-JQdSJQCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Laundry_Room_Wallpaper_Update_2.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn62@2020_5/2020/08/24/22-30-44-380_f58dd72969b39614.webp","https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3aAQXkU9EpY/XccHPZK-iJI/AAAAAAABPWE/Nc2C0SWmDcA35pe84Tat4dt0T0hRiFlWQCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Laundry_Room_Wallpaper_Update_4.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn89@2020_4/2020/08/24/22-30-32-267_c063114b3fe6d86a.webp","https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zxc_h1j4n2g/XccHOlHSkmI/AAAAAAABPWM/Di5-rXWdY-8A2oGWOCdjGII6Avd9TqNewCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Laundry_Room_Wallpaper_Update_26.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn93@2020_3/2020/08/24/22-30-42-905_7233b1d2d7607d89.webp","https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ju4fhtpke1w/XccUweXQlTI/AAAAAAABPWU/W26b2OzniN8YJLvaRVS9n7n-hceLHgjjACNcBGAsYHQ/s1600/Post_Sources.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn13@2020_4/2020/08/24/22-30-42-374_7f3c8fecc7e2350d.webp","https://assets.rewardstyle.com/production/95ff10d0e6acac7bfce7890cc392211ebedc4f7b/images/search/350.gif":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn97@2020_1/2020/08/24/22-30-40-252_df54520cbf531b93.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598308228319},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 06:30:28","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 06:30:28","title":"Teen Boy Bedroom Workspace & DIY Shelf","link":"http://www.iheartorganizing.com/2018/05/teen-boy-bedroom-workspace-diy-shelf.html","description":"Why is it that the middle of any room update is always the hardest? Maybe it is just me, but that is where I slow down and things seem to really lull. Maybe that is also why most of the rooms in our home are incomplete.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pAwo_SL-fZU/WvAuNTX1NKI/AAAAAAABMRM/2Pijbfze30Y3V2uCC7YcfTU1jmFE8NqcgCLcBGAs/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_Header.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pAwo_SL-fZU/WvAuNTX1NKI/AAAAAAABMRM/2Pijbfze30Y3V2uCC7YcfTU1jmFE8NqcgCLcBGAs/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_Header.jpg\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />I always start out strong with big ambitions and ideas and then I get to the blank slate part and become a deer in headlights. You can see more of the blank slate photos of our son's room in \n<a href=\"http://www.iheartorganizing.com/2018/02/progress-report-teen-boy-bedroom-closet.html\" target=\"_blank\">this post here</a>. It can be frustrating at times, but it is probably better that I allow myself to take these rooms at a snail's pace. I have never been one to pull off a room that I love with longevity if I race to the finish line.\n<br />\n<br />In our son's room, I got stuck on such an odd detail, and that was the shelf to install over his new desk. I tried three options before I landed on the right one so I felt a lot of thankfulness for nice return policies! (In case you are curious about the shelves I checked out for&nbsp;the space, they were \n<a href=\"https://www.ikea.com/us/en/catalog/products/70292104/?query=702.921.04\" target=\"_blank\">this one</a>, \n<a href=\"https://www.ikea.com/us/en/catalog/products/90292103/?query=902.921.03\" target=\"_blank\">this one</a>, and&nbsp;\n<a href=\"https://www.ikea.com/us/en/catalog/products/10300499/\" target=\"_blank\">this one</a>.) After holding each one up and also asking my&nbsp;son to offer up his opinion, we decided that maybe we would be better off finding one that matched the stain in the nearby DIY wall map, which tends to be the main focus in the room.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lte9TeZ_osM/WvAtkc_IGNI/AAAAAAABMRE/ujVq4zAXhHcKFwb6z03EBHQGH-nkGI-9ACLcBGAs/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_10.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lte9TeZ_osM/WvAtkc_IGNI/AAAAAAABMRE/ujVq4zAXhHcKFwb6z03EBHQGH-nkGI-9ACLcBGAs/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_10.jpg\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />Why was a shelf important? Well, my goal is to give my&nbsp;son a workspace that is easy to keep wide open and clear of clutter. He tends to be more productive and efficient when he is free of distractions and has simple organization. I guess the apple doesn't fall far from the tree!\n<br />\n<br />So, a shelf not only would add a nice decorative touch to the space, it would also function as a place to toss some of those extra office supplies that tend to land on a desk. When the other shelves didn't feel right, I found \n<a href=\"http://bit.ly/2IlbAnz\" target=\"_blank\">these</a> and used them as our inspiration to DIY something. We needed something that was a good depth for holding books and boxes, but not too deep that it felt heavy and out of place.\n<br />\n<br />We already had a pair of the \n<a href=\"https://www.ikea.com/us/en/catalog/products/10136135/#/90136136\" target=\"_blank\">7 1/2\" EKBY shelf brackets from IKEA</a>, so I thought it would be quick and easy to just head to the hardware store and grab a piece of standard lumbar to stain. I took the brackets with me only to realize that the common boards are generally a 3/4\" thickness, and the brackets really needed something closer to an inch thick. I searched the store for something that would be a better fit, and then I remembered that I had used a stair tread with these types of brackets in the past. YES! Not what you might typically think of or go to, but it makes the perfect shelf option. Not only are they the correct thickness, they are also strong and sturdy and shouldn't bow easily.\n<br />\n<br />\n<i>The obvious solution may have been to pair and IKEA EKBY shelf with these EKBY brackets, but they didn't offer a finish that we were trying to achieve.</i>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qx1jQkly7y4/WvALZJICqJI/AAAAAAABMOs/V3-V_gwrml8UHA6jMgs8vA8yH6zTlg5jwCEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_1.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"450\" data-original-width=\"600\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qx1jQkly7y4/WvALZJICqJI/AAAAAAABMOs/V3-V_gwrml8UHA6jMgs8vA8yH6zTlg5jwCEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_1.png\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />My favorite projects are ones that I can do quickly and easily with little to no help or money, and this one checked all of those boxes!\n<br />\n<br />I began with the following supplies, many which I already had on hand from previous DIY projects.\n<br />\n<br />\n<ul>\n <li>Circular or Table Saw</li>\n <li>Tape Measure</li>\n <li><a href=\"http://bit.ly/2JWXcz0\" target=\"_blank\">Wood Conditioner</a></li>\n <li><a href=\"http://bit.ly/2IeiLy3\" target=\"_blank\">Stain</a> &amp; Rags</li>\n <li><a href=\"http://bit.ly/2JZlLeN\" target=\"_blank\">Stair Tread</a></li>\n <li><a href=\"https://www.ikea.com/us/en/catalog/products/10136135/#/90136136\" target=\"_blank\">Shelf Brackets</a></li>\n <li><a href=\"http://bit.ly/2JWTK7y\" target=\"_blank\">Flat Black Spray Paint</a></li>\n</ul>\n<div>\n <br />\n</div>\n<div>\n The first step was to measure and cut the stair tread down to size. I opted to remove the rounded edge of the tread to square off the shelf completely and leave it the full 48\" width.\n</div>\n<div>\n <br />\n</div>\n<div>\n After preconditioning the wood (I use \n <a href=\"http://bit.ly/2JWXcz0\" target=\"_blank\">this</a>), I gave the board two coats of a dark walnut toned&nbsp;stain.\n <br />\n <br />\n <div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n  <a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OyNOiaK0jQo/WvAm01hAvMI/AAAAAAABMQA/I4hcj2G5NG888HjvZ7et2irppmmgL48lQCEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"733\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OyNOiaK0jQo/WvAm01hAvMI/AAAAAAABMQA/I4hcj2G5NG888HjvZ7et2irppmmgL48lQCEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_3.jpg\" /></a>\n </div>\n <br />\n</div>\n<div>\n I also gave the shelf brackets a nice coat of flat black spray paint (\n <a href=\"http://bit.ly/2JWTK7y\" target=\"_blank\">this kind</a> is my favorite).\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-aOnId8Dci9s/WvALbsGt8DI/AAAAAAABMOs/SKu4s9sT_5o8mOH2iK4seHM0Wsz6VX47QCEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"733\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-aOnId8Dci9s/WvALbsGt8DI/AAAAAAABMOs/SKu4s9sT_5o8mOH2iK4seHM0Wsz6VX47QCEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_2.jpg\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />The tread shelf is a nice and tight fit into the bracket, in fact, I ended up sanding it down just a smidge and using a rubber mallet to really secure the two together. Then it was as simple as using some drywall anchors and long black screws to install it on the wall.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ATAJIR6b1R4/WvAm1WOOvHI/AAAAAAABMQE/s7N0O7Rql9AsQ4ElY8u7wTtQfA08XYZ8wCEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ATAJIR6b1R4/WvAm1WOOvHI/AAAAAAABMQE/s7N0O7Rql9AsQ4ElY8u7wTtQfA08XYZ8wCEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_4.jpg\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\"></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-t0Hz9Ez18lU/WvAm3xdFnsI/AAAAAAABMQY/zd4wAk4MXaQjPA3vgRdLBu45Ac7oj7rlgCEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_9.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-t0Hz9Ez18lU/WvAm3xdFnsI/AAAAAAABMQY/zd4wAk4MXaQjPA3vgRdLBu45Ac7oj7rlgCEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_9.jpg\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />As you can see, I also added some additional wall organization. He generally has some work-in-progress papers and reminders that I wanted to store in a wall pocket, so I dug out our old daily system pieces and spray painted them gray and black to better suit his room (I originally purchased them \n<a href=\"http://bit.ly/2JZhc4c\" target=\"_blank\">here</a> years ago in the ivory finish, the two pieces used are \n<a href=\"http://bit.ly/2jBDmy0\" target=\"_blank\">this one</a> and \n<a href=\"http://bit.ly/2KGj0QF\" target=\"_blank\">this one</a>). The pockets hold his papers and Chromebook, while the adjoining piece coralls a few of his desk accessories and supplies.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dHexCxGy2kc/WvAmzYD0dhI/AAAAAAABMQg/Rrr3MKXrZP86lMDj9CJeLt92S69XNGAUACEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_14.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dHexCxGy2kc/WvAmzYD0dhI/AAAAAAABMQg/Rrr3MKXrZP86lMDj9CJeLt92S69XNGAUACEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_14.jpg\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />On the shelf, I added \n<a href=\"https://www.ikea.com/us/en/catalog/products/10395421/\" target=\"_blank\">an inexpensive box</a> (which is a really great size for most shelves above a desk) with an \n<a href=\"http://bit.ly/2HTR79X\" target=\"_blank\">adhesive label holder</a>. Inside are all of his random homework supplies that he may need to reach for from time to time.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-T3DagM4mWp4/WvAmytN8maI/AAAAAAABMQ4/ygAPCxhoblUxZBg0lzcRq3Q9YNkBnUe2QCEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_11.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-T3DagM4mWp4/WvAmytN8maI/AAAAAAABMQ4/ygAPCxhoblUxZBg0lzcRq3Q9YNkBnUe2QCEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_11.jpg\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-N2EvyTrXK28/WvALZ2iTIDI/AAAAAAABMO0/DQMjp-AmJxYMBq2cUMLiR7Hl2Y_KAfHdQCEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_13.2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"446\" data-original-width=\"600\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-N2EvyTrXK28/WvALZ2iTIDI/AAAAAAABMO0/DQMjp-AmJxYMBq2cUMLiR7Hl2Y_KAfHdQCEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_13.2.jpg\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />I know Letterboards are the new trendy chalkboard, but you guys, my teenage boy totally digs it! He loves looking up quotes and using it to express his current mood, and I love seeing how it changes and reflects his personality. I found his \n<a href=\"https://www.hobbylobby.com/Home-Decor-Frames/Mirrors-Wall-Decor/Letter-Boards/Black-Felt-Letterboard-with-White-Letters---15-3/Green-Felt-Letterboard-with-White-Letters---11-3/4%22-x-18%22/p/80841782\" target=\"_blank\">here</a> for a great price and used \n<a href=\"http://bit.ly/2JXu6zv\" target=\"_blank\">a small tin</a> to hold all of the extra letters.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zBuzz4m9SkI/WvAv-u_EU9I/AAAAAAABMRg/Iv_VT5MdIHA5bYu0arfaiFIgkyoPT4R9gCLcBGAs/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_18.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zBuzz4m9SkI/WvAv-u_EU9I/AAAAAAABMRg/Iv_VT5MdIHA5bYu0arfaiFIgkyoPT4R9gCLcBGAs/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_18.jpg\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Dvh-rVQI3G0/WvALag3G8yI/AAAAAAABMO0/VBzdtUn4AYkP4oBdGgqeQ3kCDzpVRT0zACEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_15.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Dvh-rVQI3G0/WvALag3G8yI/AAAAAAABMO0/VBzdtUn4AYkP4oBdGgqeQ3kCDzpVRT0zACEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_15.jpg\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />He selected a soft swivel chair from our local Marshalls (\n<a href=\"http://bit.ly/2K1huaP\" target=\"_blank\">similar</a>), and the combination of it all has been many thumbs up by all of us.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yNccp5-ygyk/WvAm2cB_zXI/AAAAAAABMQ4/mOaEYSg5llAJjoC1-JWYrNlfXImisAMvwCEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_7.2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yNccp5-ygyk/WvAm2cB_zXI/AAAAAAABMQ4/mOaEYSg5llAJjoC1-JWYrNlfXImisAMvwCEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_7.2.jpg\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />The sliding closet door is our last big project for this room and we have been trying to come up with the best wood selection based on the larger size, but I think we have a pretty good plan and can't wait to get it done.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-l9CeB9OXiCc/Wo7WFXtKxXI/AAAAAAABL0o/RXGTCDmDivAr4tQKYrbPROl6TdtAxcdmwCEwYBhgL/s1600/Blank_Slate_Room_Update_Teen_Boy_IHeart_Organizing_02.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-l9CeB9OXiCc/Wo7WFXtKxXI/AAAAAAABL0o/RXGTCDmDivAr4tQKYrbPROl6TdtAxcdmwCEwYBhgL/s1600/Blank_Slate_Room_Update_Teen_Boy_IHeart_Organizing_02.jpg\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />I am glad that we found our goldilocks of shelves, the small details in a room are what make it all come together in the end. And I always get discouraged when it takes me multiple tries to source something, especially basic items, but I really wanted to share because I know a lot of you have mentioned feeling the same way in the past. Decorating definitely comes easier to some than others, but keep at it and don't settle until your gut tells you it's right.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ThRzUF4-XsQ/WvAvQ1sGspI/AAAAAAABMRY/PbIccSW4d9MDi1ypl-TCilWa4VYGpGObwCLcBGAs/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_17.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ThRzUF4-XsQ/WvAvQ1sGspI/AAAAAAABMRY/PbIccSW4d9MDi1ypl-TCilWa4VYGpGObwCLcBGAs/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_17.jpg\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />Oh! And this room has made me want to paint 100 more ceilings.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-AfOjc-4TuzE/WvAm3XULM2I/AAAAAAABMQw/3_xkK3uGUGsbtD9XIue7xtCc0NHU7S3_ACEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_8.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-AfOjc-4TuzE/WvAm3XULM2I/AAAAAAABMQw/3_xkK3uGUGsbtD9XIue7xtCc0NHU7S3_ACEwYBhgL/s1600/DIY_Wall_Shelf_EKBY_Hack_8.jpg\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />You know I love a good chit chat, so tell me, what is something that took you at least three times of trying before you found \"the one\".\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BF6SkMOjtB0/WvAfh5FGkAI/AAAAAAABMPM/CRSrZcBNsMk88s8PBOw_m3QZNUUibB-ZwCLcBGAs/s1600/Post_Product_Sources.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"28\" data-original-width=\"500\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BF6SkMOjtB0/WvAfh5FGkAI/AAAAAAABMPM/CRSrZcBNsMk88s8PBOw_m3QZNUUibB-ZwCLcBGAs/s1600/Post_Product_Sources.png\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />\n<center> \n <div class=\"shopthepost-widget\" data-widget-id=\"3126436\">\n  <script type=\"text/javascript\">!function(d,s,id){var e, p = /^http:/.test(d.location) ?
