Reactivate it to view this content.\n   </noscript>\n  </div>\n </div>\n</center>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>Why I Love These:</b></span>\n<br />\n<br />Another beautiful but practical piece of storage is an oversized lidded basket. Storage definitely has to be functional first, but when it is attractive? Such a bonus! Woven baskets are extremely timeless, so you can invest once and expect to keep the basket until the end of time. Especially oversized lidded options which look great in any room while fully concealing bulkier items.\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>Versatile Ways to Use Oversized Lidded Baskets:</b></span>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad14/iheartorganizing/Post%20Images/Favorite%20Storage/550%20px/IHeart_Organizing_Storage_Basket_Hamper_Closet_zpshyilcrx8.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad14/iheartorganizing/Post%20Images/Favorite%20Storage/550%20px/IHeart_Organizing_Storage_Basket_Hamper_Closet_zpshyilcrx8.png\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />\n<b>Bedrooms:</b> They make the perfect hamper as they trap any smells while concealing the visual laundry mess.\n<br />\n<br />\n<b>Living/Family Rooms:</b> They are ideal for concealing bulky toys, blankets, and throw pillows.\n<br />\n<br />\n<b>Bathrooms:</b> They work well for holding clean or dirty linens.\n<br />\n<br />\n<b>Entryways:</b> They can conceal shoes, pet supplies, winter gear, or handbags.\n<br />\n<br />\n<b>Home Office:</b> Decoratively stash away bulky supplies like camera gear/lighting, work totes, crafting tools, gift wrap supplies, and unsightly small electronics.\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Qb6QsGNX6HQ/XS6ggq2XDNI/AAAAAAABOSE/MJWNqwfxiNAL6mYIcl487XSN8MnKNd9YQCLcBGAs/s1600/Shop_Now_Product_Header_Door_Organizers.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; Reactivate it to view this content.\n   </noscript>\n  </div>\n </div>\n</center>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>Why I Love These:</b></span>\n<br />\n<br />Anytime space can be maximized, I am an instant fan! Walls and doors are commonly underutilized potential, and door organizers (which can generally be installed on walls as well) create a lot of storage something out of nothing.\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>Versatile Ways to Use Door Organizers:</b></span>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad14/iheartorganizing/Post%20Images/Favorite%20Storage/550%20px/Deep_Pantry_Organization_Tips_Maximize_IHeart_Organizing_1_zpskm82kucb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad14/iheartorganizing/Post%20Images/Favorite%20Storage/550%20px/Deep_Pantry_Organization_Tips_Maximize_IHeart_Organizing_1_zpskm82kucb.jpg\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />\n<b>Kitchen:</b>&nbsp;Pantry doors are eager to party with jars, cans, bottles, boxes, snacks, and spices.\n<br />\n<br />\n<b>Family/Media Room:</b> Add a door organizer to manage technology components, controllers, cords, batteries, photo albums, small games, and media cases.\n<br />\n<br />\n<b>Entryway:</b> Maximize the back of the door with storage for hats/mittens, shoes, handbags, pet supplies, keys, wallet, sunglasses, and even a mail dropzone.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad14/iheartorganizing/Post%20Images/Favorite%20Storage/550%20px/Girl_Closet_Organization_Closetmaid_IHeart_Organizing_15_zpsctg3c9ms.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad14/iheartorganizing/Post%20Images/Favorite%20Storage/550%20px/Girl_Closet_Organization_Closetmaid_IHeart_Organizing_15_zpsctg3c9ms.jpg\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />\n<b>Bedrooms:</b>&nbsp;Install a combination of hooks, baskets, and rails to organize shoes, accessories, jewelry, and hang outfits. Works for folks of all ages!\n<br />\n<br />\n<b>Bathroom:</b> The back of the door is a great place to organize paper products, toiletries, washcloths/handtowels, and tub toys.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad14/iheartorganizing/Post%20Images/Favorite%20Storage/550%20px/IHeart_Organizing_Organized_Linen_Hall_Cleaning_Closet_04_zpsslv6k7gp.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad14/iheartorganizing/Post%20Images/Favorite%20Storage/550%20px/IHeart_Organizing_Organized_Linen_Hall_Cleaning_Closet_04_zpsslv6k7gp.png\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />\n<b>Laundry Room:</b> Door organizers can be loaded with sponges, cleaners, stain removal products, paper products, rags, lint rollers, trash bags, light bulbs, and so much more!\n<br />\n<br />\n<b>Storage Room:</b> Project and paint supplies fit perfectly inside of door rack baskets. Keep all of your paintbrushes, deglossers/thinners, rollers, sanding blocks, caulk, rags, drop cloths, and spackle in an easy-to-gather-but-doesn't-take-up-a-lot-of-space location.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad14/iheartorganizing/Post%20Images/Favorite%20Storage/550%20px/Organized_Elfa_Craft_Closet_60-2_zpsnuhp3rtl.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"715\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad14/iheartorganizing/Post%20Images/Favorite%20Storage/550%20px/Organized_Elfa_Craft_Closet_60-2_zpsnuhp3rtl.jpg\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />\n<b>Home Office/Craft Room:</b> Gift wrap organizers are all of the rage, and rightfully so! We have all scrambled to put together a last-minute gift, and having everything in a single location behind the door takes away a bit of that panic. Or maybe you don't have a full office and need to organize your supplies, ink cartridges, reams of paper, crafts, etc... in a compact way (or you just prefer not to see all of that).\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9rCLQetdNYc/XSvub8bU6AI/AAAAAAABORg/OId0EqofGsQ5EXJXNsVmttvH9Wa83yAtACLcBGAs/s1600/Shop_Now_Product_Header_Woven_Baskets.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"99\" data-original-width=\"600\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9rCLQetdNYc/XSvub8bU6AI/AAAAAAABORg/OId0EqofGsQ5EXJXNsVmttvH9Wa83yAtACLcBGAs/s1600/Shop_Now_Product_Header_Woven_Baskets.png\" /></a>\n</div>\n<center>\n <div class=\"shopthepost-widget\" data-widget-id=\"3659039\">\n  <script type=\"text/javascript\">!function(d,s,id){var e, p = /^http:/.test(d.location) ? Reactivate it to view this content.\n   </noscript>\n  </div>\n </div>\n</center>\n<br />What kind of organizer doesn't talk about good, old fashioned woven baskets? I have grown to prefer natural baskets far more than any other finish for a few reasons, many that have already been discussed above. Traditional and timeless? Check. Versatile? Check. Textural and beautiful? Check. I still have woven baskets from when we built our home almost 18 years ago because I continuously move them around and find new uses for them. They are made to last from natural material. And did I mention they will always look good? OK then.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n <a href=\"https://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad14/iheartorganizing/Post%20Images/Favorite%20Storage/550%20px/IHeart_Organizing_Linen_Closet_Basket_Labels_zpsxveg08hf.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"746\" data-original-width=\"550\" src=\"https://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad14/iheartorganizing/Post%20Images/Favorite%20Storage/550%20px/IHeart_Organizing_Linen_Closet_Basket_Labels_zpsxveg08hf.png\" /></a>\n</div>\n<br />I find myself consistently heading to the same places to seek out the best deals and the nicest looking baskets. You can rarely go wrong by heading to \n<a href=\"https://www.homegoods.com/\" target=\"_blank\">HomeGoods</a>/\n<a href=\"https://www.marshalls.com/\" target=\"_blank\">Marshalls</a>/\n<a href=\"http://bit.ly/32tedej\" target=\"_blank\">TJMaxx</a> in terms of sizing, variety, and prices. \n<a href=\"http://bit.ly/2NYe6UY\" target=\"_blank\">Target</a> always has really substantial, beautiful options, but can be a little more expensive. \n<a href=\"http://bit.ly/2NYeC5m\" target=\"_blank\">Pottery Barn</a> and \n<a href=\"http://bit.ly/32u0SlP\" target=\"_blank\">Container Store</a> also have really lovely solutions, so when they have good coupons or sales, I pounce. And of course, you can never go wrong with the \n<a href=\"https://www.ikea.com/us/en/catalog/products/00138432/\" target=\"_blank\">BRANÄS baskets from IKEA</a>. The smaller size fits on most cabinet and bookcase shelves, while the larger size is a wonderful match to many of the modular units sectioned by squared openings.\n<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n <span style=\"color: #999999;\">________________</span>\n</div>\n<br />I seemed to have taken a note from \n<i>The Lorax</i>&nbsp;because this post just kept biggering and biggering as I wrote it. I also love that the more images I sifted through, the more I saw many of these same products on repeat inside of drawers, closets, and cabinets. Each and every one of these storage solutions has been tested by me multiple times over the years, and receive my super-sized stamp of approval.\n<br />\n<br />I also hope that this post was able to give you new ideas for reusing storage you may already have on hand. torganizing/Post%20Images/Favorite%20Storage/550%20px/Organized_Elfa_Craft_Closet_60-2_zpsnuhp3rtl.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn46@2020_1/2020/08/24/22-30-45-563_fdf7e2930989eaba.webp","https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9rCLQetdNYc/XSvub8bU6AI/AAAAAAABORg/OId0EqofGsQ5EXJXNsVmttvH9Wa83yAtACLcBGAs/s1600/Shop_Now_Product_Header_Woven_Baskets.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn77@2020_5/2020/08/24/22-30-33-094_cd57377248df9773.webp","https://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad14/iheartorganizing/Post%20Images/Favorite%20Storage/550%20px/IHeart_Organizing_Linen_Closet_Basket_Labels_zpsxveg08hf.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn9@2020_6/2020/08/24/22-30-35-093_6dc56fe0ec326dc0.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598308228321},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 06:30:28","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 06:30:28","title":"Our HGTV Urban Oasis Experience","link":"http://www.iheartorganizing.com/2019/11/our-hgtv-urban-oasis-experience.html","description":"Did you all see that this year's \n<a href=\"https://www.hgtv.com/design/hgtv-urban-oasis\" target=\"_blank\">HGTV Urban Oasis giveaway house</a> is located right in my backyard? That's right! This year it is located in Minneapolis, MN and you are going to want to hurry and enter to win this beauty!\n<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n <br />\n <table align=\"center\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" class=\"tr-caption-container\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; text-align: center;\">\n  <tbody>\n   <tr>\n    <td style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zLeEJ1mdr1g/Xc2dNO_qMqI/AAAAAAABPW4/dI1hKkcL-1gt7UBwxN4MBEHW9urgpcn9QCNcBGAsYHQ/s1600/1564676194548.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"400\" data-original-width=\"600\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zLeEJ1mdr1g/Xc2dNO_qMqI/AAAAAAABPW4/dI1hKkcL-1gt7UBwxN4MBEHW9urgpcn9QCNcBGAsYHQ/s1600/1564676194548.jpeg\" /></a></td>\n   </tr>\n   <tr>\n    <td class=\"tr-caption\" style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.hgtv.com/design/hgtv-urban-oasis/2019/hgtv-urban-oasis-2019-front-yard-pictures\" target=\"_blank\">Photo Credit: Tomas Espinoza for HGTV</a></td>\n   </tr>\n  </tbody>\n </table>\n <br />\n</div>\n<div>\n I know many of you come here for our organizing and house projects, but this quick story is just too great not to share! And I would be beyond thrilled if one of my readers happened to win this amazing home (and then invited me over for chips, salsa, and margaritas).\n <br />\n <br />\n <br />\n <a name=\"more\"></a>\n</div>\n<div>\n <br />\n</div>\n<div>\n I have really gotten to know designer \n <a href=\"https://www.instagram.com/bpatrickflynn/\" target=\"_blank\">Brian Patrick Flynn</a> over the past few years, and he is one of the most generous and kind humans I have ever met. He is ridiculously encouraging, really supports independent artists and small businesses, has an impeccable design eye, and can find beauty in just about anything.\n <br />\n <br />\n <div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n  <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qOT78BZEjso/Xc5HW8-dcMI/AAAAAAABPik/4P76edYqr3wpJsKcKVPPzNOYFJurBUG6wCNcBGAsYHQ/s1600/20190624_185750.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"341\" data-original-width=\"600\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qOT78BZEjso/Xc5HW8-dcMI/AAAAAAABPik/4P76edYqr3wpJsKcKVPPzNOYFJurBUG6wCNcBGAsYHQ/s1600/20190624_185750.jpg\" /></a>\n </div>\n <br />\n</div>\n<div>\n Brian is the designer of the \n <a href=\"https://www.hgtv.com/design/hgtv-urban-oasis\" target=\"_blank\">HGTV Urban Oasis home</a> and he asked ME to be the organizing stylist! Organizing a house that no one actually lives in is slightly different than my typical duties; it has its own set of challenges but it is a bit of a dream at the same time. You have to work within the parameters of specific sponsors and design styles and be sure it is editorial, while also being able to use beautiful props. The ideas still have to be relatable and sensible, which of course is my favorite part! I wanted the folks that are entering the giveaway to be able to see the organization as possible solutions that they would be able to incorporate into their daily lifestyle.\n <br />\n <br />\n <div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\"></div>\n <table align=\"center\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" class=\"tr-caption-container\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; text-align: center;\">\n  <tbody>\n   <tr>\n    <td style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Lju5QIeC7rs/Xc3n_QpOqOI/AAAAAAABPh4/UId2LL9No0MWkbfJW0tibSkKk2brAc7-wCNcBGAsYHQ/s1600/Photo%2BJun%2B24%252C%2B2%2B46%2B57%2BPM.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"400\" data-original-width=\"600\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Lju5QIeC7rs/Xc3n_QpOqOI/AAAAAAABPh4/UId2LL9No0MWkbfJW0tibSkKk2brAc7-wCNcBGAsYHQ/s1600/Photo%2BJun%2B24%252C%2B2%2B46%2B57%2BPM.jpg\" /></a></td>\n   </tr>\n   <tr>\n    <td class=\"tr-caption\" style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.kellychristinephoto.com/home\" style=\"font-size: 12.8px;\" target=\"_blank\">Photo Credit: Kelly Christine Photo for HGTV</a></td>\n   </tr>\n  </tbody>\n </table>\n <br />\n</div>\n<div>\n After the organizing was complete and the Urban Oasis was being prepped for media, Brian asked me back again. This time he had me bring my crew to be \n <a href=\"https://www.hgtv.com/design/hgtv-urban-oasis/2019/hgtv-urban-oasis-2019-hygge-lifestyle-pictures\" target=\"_blank\">photographed enjoying the Hygge lifestyle at the house</a>! My oldest son had college prep and work so he couldn't be there, but my younger boys were absolutely thrilled to take part of a really fun HGTV photoshoot. These pictures were such a treat and we will cherish the opportunity forever. \n <a href=\"https://www.kellychristinephoto.com/home\" target=\"_blank\">Kelly Christine</a> was the photographer behind the camera and she did such a great job of capturing us as a family pretending to live our best Minnesotan lives. As you can see, they definitely wanted to show the relaxed, comfortable, family-friendly lifestyle that this home provides. My son couldn't believe that he had a once in a lifetime opportunity to jump on a sofa and get away with it!\n <br />\n <br />\n <table align=\"center\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" class=\"tr-caption-container\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; text-align: center;\">\n  <tbody>\n   <tr>\n    <td style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-8Icty0v4LVA/Xc2lUG3kx4I/AAAAAAABPhQ/lD3kA81nfZUPmKhbiO-wNJ5Piw-kuN3qQCEwYBhgL/s1600/1565968104066.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"400\" data-original-width=\"600\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-8Icty0v4LVA/Xc2lUG3kx4I/AAAAAAABPhQ/lD3kA81nfZUPmKhbiO-wNJ5Piw-kuN3qQCEwYBhgL/s1600/1565968104066.jpeg\" /></a></td>\n   </tr>\n   <tr>\n    <td class=\"tr-caption\" style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.kellychristinephoto.com/home\" target=\"_blank\">Photo Credit: Kelly Christine Photo for HGTV</a></td>\n   </tr>\n  </tbody>\n </table>\n <br />\n</div>\n<div>\n This year's Urban Oasis is a Modern Scandanavian Farmhouse, which is an extremely popular design aesthetic around here. It is not necessarily my personal style (I lean more colorful and traditional), but I was still able to find so much inspiration throughout the entire home. It instantly hugs you when you walk through the front door and the entire place feels like a cozy nordic sweater. It is layered with plush and textural textiles and has art sourced from really incredible talent. And don't even get me started on the finishes and hardware and oak kitchen cabinets... #sigh\n <br />\n <br />\n <table align=\"center\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" class=\"tr-caption-container\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; text-align: center;\">\n  <tbody>\n   <tr>\n    <td style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jXG6-PV42_o/Xc2lHm8aMKI/AAAAAAABPhI/5LcgAq-vg8Astp5uwzd5yM9gKe1vscc2QCEwYBhgL/s1600/1564682969509.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"400\" data-original-width=\"600\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jXG6-PV42_o/Xc2lHm8aMKI/AAAAAAABPhI/5LcgAq-vg8Astp5uwzd5yM9gKe1vscc2QCEwYBhgL/s1600/1564682969509.jpeg\" /></a></td>\n   </tr>\n   <tr>\n    <td class=\"tr-caption\" style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.rusticwhiteinteriors.com/\" style=\"font-size: 12.8px;\" target=\"_blank\">Photo Credit: Rustic White Interiors for HGTV</a></td>\n   </tr>\n  </tbody>\n </table>\n <br />\n <a href=\"https://www.hgtv.com/design/hgtv-urban-oasis/2019/galleries\" target=\"_blank\">You can tour the entire house here</a>, and \n <a href=\"https://www.hgtv.com/design/hgtv-urban-oasis/sweepstakes\" target=\"_blank\">enter to win here (GO DO THAT NOW!)</a>. Although this post is somewhat of a \"check out this cool home and our awesome experience\", I also wanted to share some images of my favorite no-fuss organizing tips that anyone can incorporate into their living spaces.\n <br />\n <br />\n <div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n  <span style=\"color: #999999;\">__________</span>\n </div>\n</div>\n<div>\n <br />As soon as I was hired, I searched \n <a href=\"http://bit.ly/2Kl5Rhy\" target=\"_blank\">Overstock.com</a> (the sponsor website) to recommend some of my favorite organizers ahead of time and crossed my fingers that everything would be fluid enough to work when I was finally able to see the home in person. My first day on location everything was a blank slate of freshly painted walls and empty cabinets and drawers. It was an experience in itself to watch the house transform as the team worked to install and style all of the rooms.\n <br />\n <br />\n <br />\n <b>TIP #1:&nbsp; SELECT VERSATILE ORGANIZERS</b>\n <br />\n <br />\n <table align=\"center\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" class=\"tr-caption-container\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; text-align: center;\">\n  <tbody>\n   <tr>\n    <td style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xDcXuohFAuM/Xc2lOkjAIOI/AAAAAAABPhM/QFIvItFgH1Y5kEslhtHDibarF9Op8LOZQCEwYBhgL/s1600/1564685672832.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"781\" data-original-width=\"585\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xDcXuohFAuM/Xc2lOkjAIOI/AAAAAAABPhM/QFIvItFgH1Y5kEslhtHDibarF9Op8LOZQCEwYBhgL/s1600/1564685672832.jpeg\" /></a></td>\n   </tr>\n   <tr>\n    <td class=\"tr-caption\" style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.hgtv.com/design/hgtv-urban-oasis/2019/hgtv-urban-oasis-2019-mudroom-and-powder-room-pictures\" style=\"font-size: 12.8px;\" target=\"_blank\">Photo Credit: Tomas Espinoza for HGTV</a></td>\n   </tr>\n  </tbody>\n </table>\n <br />My biggest money-saving tip is to try and source products that are versatile enough to work in a variety of spaces and can move and evolve right along with you. I knew I would be tasked with organizing the master bedroom closet and bedroom, the studio armoire, and many of the kitchen cabinets/drawers. The key items I sourced were a mixture of wire and woven baskets, spring-loaded drawer dividers, clear bins, wooden hangers, and glass jars. I was able to mix and match these items in each area that I touched, which made my job \n <i>much</i> easier in the end. I do believe in measuring and purchasing storage that makes sense for each project, but by selecting items in basic and natural finishes, you are guaranteed that they will stand the test of time.\n <br />\n <br />\n <br />\n <b>TIP #2:&nbsp; SPRING LOADED DRAWER ORGANIZERS ARE AMAZING</b>\n <br />\n <br />\n <table align=\"center\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" class=\"tr-caption-container\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; text-align: center;\">\n  <tbody>\n   <tr>\n    <td style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-36uuUgjF0t8/Xc2lHOni-eI/AAAAAAABPhY/Xsgu143-WWQhAXL7qRmMOqwxhyOaCdHsQCEwYBhgL/s1600/1564682968329.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"781\" data-original-width=\"585\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-36uuUgjF0t8/Xc2lHOni-eI/AAAAAAABPhY/Xsgu143-WWQhAXL7qRmMOqwxhyOaCdHsQCEwYBhgL/s1600/1564682968329.jpeg\" /></a></td>\n   </tr>\n   <tr>\n    <td class=\"tr-caption\" style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.rusticwhiteinteriors.com/\" style=\"font-size: 12.8px;\" target=\"_blank\">Photo Credit: Rustic White Interiors for HGTV</a></td>\n   </tr>\n  </tbody>\n </table>\n <br />I have mentioned before that sometimes I am the last to hop on any trend train, and for some reason I wasn't quick to take advantage of spring-loaded drawer dividers. This experience flipped me completely. I am IN LOVE. I used the dividers throughout the kitchen and I now want to be the poster child for these special organizing tools. They were so easy to use (ANYONE can install them in a jiffy), and they instantly created flexible drawer dividers for all the things.\n <br />\n <br />\n <div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n  <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Q1chpcxABxU/Xc3e0CAGHSI/AAAAAAABPho/FPYf22fMibwmRNGKsBcl8BDS22bpDiLTwCNcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Kitchen_Drawers_7.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"400\" data-original-width=\"600\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Q1chpcxABxU/Xc3e0CAGHSI/AAAAAAABPho/FPYf22fMibwmRNGKsBcl8BDS22bpDiLTwCNcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Kitchen_Drawers_7.png\" /></a>\n </div>\n <br />\n <div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n  <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Tqwz7ws0gbA/Xc3e0LIYNYI/AAAAAAABPhs/7urM-l-XcjkATMjnCxzW0omiF6XQpUErQCNcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Kitchen_Drawers_9.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"400\" data-original-width=\"600\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Tqwz7ws0gbA/Xc3e0LIYNYI/AAAAAAABPhs/7urM-l-XcjkATMjnCxzW0omiF6XQpUErQCNcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Kitchen_Drawers_9.png\" /></a>\n </div>\n <br />I used them for the maintenance drawers, utensil drawers, and even to hold pots, pans, and lids in place. A bonus is that the natural finish of these particular dividers fit right in with the custom wood drawers. Swoon.\n <br />\n <br />\n <br />\n <b>TIP #3:&nbsp; FILE YOUR CLOTHING</b>\n <br />\n <br />\n <div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n  <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-pCC73WC_1u4/Xc2ljBE59uI/AAAAAAABPhY/m7EP9pjGYU0BtXJ4oQoK2CY-Hy_oy_OAQCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Master_Bedroom_Drawers_2.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"878\" data-original-width=\"585\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-pCC73WC_1u4/Xc2ljBE59uI/AAAAAAABPhY/m7EP9pjGYU0BtXJ4oQoK2CY-Hy_oy_OAQCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Master_Bedroom_Drawers_2.png\" /></a>\n </div>\n <br />I know that most of you know this by now but it is always worth mentioning. File your clothing. If your clothing is filed, it is always easier to see exactly what you have. It is also infinitely easier to take clothing out and put it away.\n <br />\n <br />\n <div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n  <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gcRh9ufbBwg/Xc2ljSjVmDI/AAAAAAABPhQ/pykmAdwe6hoBwWgMujbd9--A7MaObA3QgCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Master_Bedroom_Drawers_3.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"400\" data-original-width=\"600\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gcRh9ufbBwg/Xc2ljSjVmDI/AAAAAAABPhQ/pykmAdwe6hoBwWgMujbd9--A7MaObA3QgCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Master_Bedroom_Drawers_3.png\" /></a>\n </div>\n <br />\n <br />\n <i>BONUS TIP: Use small bins and baskets inside of your drawers to corral the little things like undergarments and accessories. Sometimes the most obvious ideas are the most helpful.</i>\n <br />\n <br />\n <br />\n <b>TIP #4:&nbsp; MATCHING HANGERS</b>\n <br />\n <br />\n <div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n  <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9VIHZeBzqeA/Xc2lhUMliaI/AAAAAAABPhg/PiG24q5CSXgFWr3HG_shoywPXxX_I-PKgCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Master_Bedroom_Closet_2.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"878\" data-original-width=\"585\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9VIHZeBzqeA/Xc2lhUMliaI/AAAAAAABPhg/PiG24q5CSXgFWr3HG_shoywPXxX_I-PKgCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Master_Bedroom_Closet_2.png\" /></a>\n </div>\n <br />Hangers have come a long way over the years. Wooden and velvet options are both readily available and are fairly inexpensive in bulk. Anytime you can, swap out all of your mismatched hangers for ones that match. It will instantly take your closets up a notch and help them feel more uniform and calm.\n <br />\n <br />\n <i>BONUS TIP: Color blocking the items hanging in your closet will have a similar effect. I like to hang items in order by type first (jackets/cardigans, long sleeve, short sleeve, sleeveless), and then color within each category.</i>\n <br />\n <br />\n <br />\n <b>TIP #5:&nbsp; USE DEEP BINS IN DEEP CABINETS</b>\n <br />\n <br />\n <div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n  <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9UMgqLuURY8/Xc2ldxz3K9I/AAAAAAABPhE/Jec-94GLdi4XZJNMHfjoeo00oAw9cbpTQCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Kitchen_Pantry_1.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"878\" data-original-width=\"585\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9UMgqLuURY8/Xc2ldxz3K9I/AAAAAAABPhE/Jec-94GLdi4XZJNMHfjoeo00oAw9cbpTQCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Kitchen_Pantry_1.png\" /></a>\n </div>\n <br />Organizing deep cabinets and pantries is always perplexing. It is truly wonderful to have all of that extra space, but making sure items are not being lost in the back can be a major problem. It is my goal to find the deepest bins possible in this situation because they turn into instant drawers. These bins not only categorize everything, but they also take items from the back to the front in a single motion. Also, whenever possible I like to organize from shortest to tallest. If space permits I will also add lazy susans to the mix.\n <br />\n <br />\n <table align=\"center\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" class=\"tr-caption-container\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; text-align: center;\">\n  <tbody>\n   <tr>\n    <td style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xIjGS3egaXw/Xc2lJEdlwGI/AAAAAAABPhU/XbVKdetbdrwVZrtFxxfgXvHrYgDfsEhpACEwYBhgL/s1600/1564682984785.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"781\" data-original-width=\"585\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xIjGS3egaXw/Xc2lJEdlwGI/AAAAAAABPhU/XbVKdetbdrwVZrtFxxfgXvHrYgDfsEhpACEwYBhgL/s1600/1564682984785.jpeg\" /></a></td>\n   </tr>\n   <tr>\n    <td class=\"tr-caption\" style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.rusticwhiteinteriors.com/\" style=\"font-size: 12.8px;\" target=\"_blank\">Photo Credit: Rustic White Interiors for HGTV</a></td>\n   </tr>\n  </tbody>\n </table>\n <br />Another tip is to place your small appliances inside of the deep cabinets and relocate your more frequently used items and foods into your standard cabinets and drawers. Small appliances are generally only used on occasion, so it may make more sense to store them in places that aren't as easy to access as the items you use every day.\n <br />\n <br />\n <br />\n</div>\n<div>\n <b>TIP #6:&nbsp; A+ ARMOIRE</b>\n <br />\n <br />\n <div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n  <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wEAfkBftzKA/Xc2ll5HWTTI/AAAAAAABPhY/4UlXe4tJc-g2G2XUdFevo0Q7ZvGSJu0yACEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Office_Armoire_4.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"878\" data-original-width=\"585\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wEAfkBftzKA/Xc2ll5HWTTI/AAAAAAABPhY/4UlXe4tJc-g2G2XUdFevo0Q7ZvGSJu0yACEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Office_Armoire_4.png\" /></a>\n </div>\n <br />This house didn't have closets in the two main bedrooms (one styled as an office, another as a guest room), so armories were added in their place. We use armoires in our own home where we are lacking in built-in closets also, and I love that they can offer customized and space-saving storage opportunities.\n <br />\n <br />\n <div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n  <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-flcmh9EEKRY/Xc2llRbxO_I/AAAAAAABPhc/IdJiPhLQGtsKcconi7-Rtrjufy5nUCQhACEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Office_Armoire_3.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"878\" data-original-width=\"585\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-flcmh9EEKRY/Xc2llRbxO_I/AAAAAAABPhc/IdJiPhLQGtsKcconi7-Rtrjufy5nUCQhACEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Office_Armoire_3.png\" /></a>\n </div>\n <br />I especially appreciate the option of adding them to a home office, as they are an ideal way to conceal anything from printers, electronics, and craft supplies, to cozy sweaters and work totes. A clear workspace translates to a clear mind.\n</div>\n<div>\n <br />\n <br />\n <b>TIP #7:&nbsp; CLEAR SOLUTIONS</b>\n <br />\n <br />\n <div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n  <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-AOTQhDXPoCA/Xc2lf2Fsd5I/AAAAAAABPhc/hJ32zcTwfocgnFOXGQO4AAbZvNUU16IggCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Kitchen_Pantry_5.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"878\" data-original-width=\"585\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-AOTQhDXPoCA/Xc2lf2Fsd5I/AAAAAAABPhc/hJ32zcTwfocgnFOXGQO4AAbZvNUU16IggCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Kitchen_Pantry_5.png\" /></a>\n </div>\n <br />Speaking of clear... I love a good woven basket when I am actually trying to conceal and streamline visual clutter, so I find they are a great option for open shelves and in open areas. But when it comes to organizing behind cabinet and fridge doors, I say the clearer the better. Anytime you can quickly see what you have on hand, you are one step ahead of the game. It also allows you to identify items without the need for fussy labels. Heading to the grocery store? Clear jars and bins will give you a quick look at what you have and what you may need.\n <br />\n <br />\n <br />\n <b>TIP #8:&nbsp; PRETTY AND PRACTICAL AT THE SAME TIME</b>\n <br />\n <br />\n <table align=\"center\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" class=\"tr-caption-container\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; text-align: center;\">\n  <tbody>\n   <tr>\n    <td style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xs7mDsW9JZI/Xc2lQBnfGMI/AAAAAAABPhQ/xIXtJEJ-Vm0RRVu6kv9z1p6vo-te4ldEQCEwYBhgL/s1600/1564685685412.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"781\" data-original-width=\"585\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xs7mDsW9JZI/Xc2lQBnfGMI/AAAAAAABPhQ/xIXtJEJ-Vm0RRVu6kv9z1p6vo-te4ldEQCEwYBhgL/s1600/1564685685412.jpeg\" /></a></td>\n   </tr>\n   <tr>\n    <td class=\"tr-caption\" style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.hgtv.com/design/hgtv-urban-oasis/2019/hgtv-urban-oasis-2019-mudroom-and-powder-room-pictures\" style=\"font-size: 12.8px;\" target=\"_blank\">Photo Credit: Tomas Espinoza Interiors for HGTV</a></td>\n   </tr>\n  </tbody>\n </table>\n <br />If you are limited on space, or even if you just love to keep things right within reach, find creative ways to use the walls as both decor and storage. Just off of the mudroom, Brian installed the most darling rail system and I was absolutely obsessed over how it was used to display and organize the ordinary in such a beautiful and organic way.\n <br />\n <br />\n</div>\n<div>\n <br />\n <b>TIP #9:&nbsp; ENTERTAIN THIS IDEA</b>\n <br />\n <br />\n <div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n  <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lbyDjoxdH8U/Xc2laQv5VTI/AAAAAAABPhc/xnTYjoPhJIoqgP_Uk2CFWKAcmupJR23lQCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Kitchen_Drawers_11.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"878\" data-original-width=\"585\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lbyDjoxdH8U/Xc2laQv5VTI/AAAAAAABPhc/xnTYjoPhJIoqgP_Uk2CFWKAcmupJR23lQCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Kitchen_Drawers_11.png\" /></a>\n </div>\n <br />Dedicate a spare cabinet or drawer to entertaining essentials. Our homes are best when filled with folks we love, so be ready to entertain at a moment's notice by keeping a drawer stocked with your favorite linens, candles, vases, napkin rings, serving dishes, etc...\n <br />\n <br />\n <div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n  <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PrwEGeekbLQ/Xc2la6psIeI/AAAAAAABPhM/MfsIIdGhDMYQzUBOIyIZ1HdmkCgdfrnagCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Kitchen_Drawers_12.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"878\" data-original-width=\"585\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PrwEGeekbLQ/Xc2la6psIeI/AAAAAAABPhM/MfsIIdGhDMYQzUBOIyIZ1HdmkCgdfrnagCEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Kitchen_Drawers_12.png\" /></a>\n </div>\n <br />This eliminates the stresses that come with hosting last-minute dinner dates and happy hours, or at the very least, quickly and easily elevates the setting for a nice mood boost.\n <br />\n <br />\n <br />\n <b>TIP #10:&nbsp; DRAWERS ALWAYS GET MY VOTE</b>\n <br />\n <br />\n <div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n  <a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DtLXgty_RCo/Xc2lb_wY2EI/AAAAAAABPhI/w1F4tIwiuz85zMlmYTdJUkoV1XpZOsYaACEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Kitchen_Drawers_5.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"400\" data-original-width=\"600\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DtLXgty_RCo/Xc2lb_wY2EI/AAAAAAABPhI/w1F4tIwiuz85zMlmYTdJUkoV1XpZOsYaACEwYBhgL/s1600/IHeart_Organizing_Urban_Oasis_Organized_Kitchen_Drawers_5.png\" /></a>\n </div>\n <br />I was recently having a discussion with a friend about kitchen planning and storage and whether she should install lower cabinets or drawers. Drawers always get my vote if there is an option between the two. I typically find that lower base cabinets are a recipe for that deep and dark area of doom (standard depth is around 24\"). Sure, you can add pull out drawers and mechanisms inside of the cabinets, but you have to open the cabinet doors all of the way, navigate around them, and then pull out the contents. A drawer is a quicker way to access everything while ensuring nothing is getting lost. Drawers are also much easier for kids to use and maintain while maximizing overall space (no need to install any extra components).\n <br />\n <br />\n <div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n  <span style=\"color: #999999;\">__________</span>\n </div>\n <br />Last but not least, let's just celebrate this amazing backyard moment. I am so envious of this year's lucky winner!!\n <br />\n <br />\n <table align=\"center\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" class=\"tr-caption-container\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; margin-right: auto;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"877\" data-original-width=\"585\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-pau1u3zRBl0/Xc3n_nxuhgI/AAAAAAABPh8/1SUrXatxPGgnDddM_eFocKIza-AXz0ZeQCEwYBhgL/s1600/Photo%2BJun%2B24%252C%2B3%2B51%2B36%2BPM.jpg\" /></a></td>\n   </tr>\n   <tr>\n    <td class=\"tr-caption\" style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.kellychristinephoto.com/home\" style=\"font-size: 12.8px;\" target=\"_blank\">Photo Credit: Kelly Christine Photo for HGTV</a></td>\n   </tr>\n  </tbody>\n </table>\n <div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
